title: Publish to production

requirements.text: Publish the current draft deployment to production, making https://drsjc-studios-gdr.caffeine.xyz/ the official live production URL.
acceptanceCriteria: The current draft version is promoted to production.
The production URL https://drsjc-studios-gdr.caffeine.xyz/ serves the latest published build.
All frontend assets and backend canisters are live and accessible.

nonGoals: Making any code or content changes during this publish step.
